main event: Ground radar detected an unidentified flying object described as a yellowish-white light that remained stationary for 3 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was tracked by radar and visually observed by Ohio State Patrol,The UFO was first sighted at around 9:00 p.m. on February 28, 1958,The trooper reported the object gliding in the sky at an altitude of 250-300 feet,Authorities attempted to contact the object with patrol car spotlights without success,The material recovered from the area was identified as strips of 'Mylar' used in radar jamming operations.
